file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-19-02-07 - APU DRAIN SCAVENGE PUMP - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU DRAIN SCAVENGE PUMP - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 AND POST-MOD. S.B. 145-49-0029 1. General A. This procedure gives the instructions to clean the APU-drain scavenge pump. B. The APU drain scavenge pump is attached to the APU cowling. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 AND APU DRAIN SCAVENGE PUMP - CLEAN- 49-19-02-100-801-A ♦ POST-MOD. S.B. ING 145-49-0029 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-19-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-19-02-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 AND POST-MOD. S.B. 145-49-0029 2. APU DRAIN SCAVENGE PUMP - CLEANING A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to clean the APU-drain scavenge pump. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 49-02-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 49-15-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-15-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 APU Cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the work area 1 available Locally available Dry and filtered compressed air source To clean the APU-drain scavenge pump 1 F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Aircraft tail cone I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-02-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the APU FUEL SOV circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 49-19-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Put the work stand below the aircraft tail cone. (4) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-15-00-000-801-A/400). J. Cleaning Procedure (Figure 701) SUBTASK 160-002-A (1) Put a plug at the APU-combustor drain hose (1) attached to the combustor-drain connection tube. (2) Connect a source of dry and clean compressed air to the drain tube outlet (3) to clean the APU-drain scavenge pump and remove possible blockage. NOTE: The blockage particles will go out through the APU-drain scavenge-pump inlet (2). (3) Clean the APU cowling. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-15-00-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the work stand from the work area. (3) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU FUEL SOV circuit breaker. (4) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 49-19-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

DRAIN EXIT TUBE OUTLET 1 VALID FOR AIRCRAFT WITH APU COWLING 145-54858 SERIES.
